page.title: Adverbs and AdvP - Degree Words
page.instruction:
You need to make sure the adverbs in your lexicon will be mapped to the syntax category Adv. Choose one of the following options, depending on your situation, and check it off when it is completed:
If you already have adverbs marked with the category Adv in your lexicon nothing more needs to be done.
If you have adverbs marked in your lexicon with a distinct category all their own, but it is different from Adv, go to the Category Mapper and map your morphological category to Adv.
If adverbs are mixed in with another category in the lexicon, you need to add the feature Adv to each appropriate entry so the category will be changed.

radioGroup.prompt: Looking back at your examples is this section, does your language have degree words which can modify adverbs?
Where do the degree words occur with respect to the adverb?
radioGroup.codeInfo: Before is Spec-initial default; is Spec-internal default.
radioGroup.radio: On either side of the adverb
radioGroup.ruleInfo: Either is AdvP Option 4 (no matter what the answer is to next question).
radioGroup.codeInfo: Following is grayed out unless the either button is checked

radioGroup.prompt: Can all the degree words appear on either side of the adverb?
radioGroup.radio: No, there are separate sets for each side

radioGroup.prompt: Are the degree words which can modify adverbs all the same ones?
radioGroup.radio: Yes, the same set can modify any type of adverb
Almost; the same set can modify temporals, locatives, and manner adverbs, but reason adverbs are not modified

No, there are distinct sets of degree words for each type of adverb. Note that some overlap is OK (just add more than one modifies... feature after a space), and none for reason is OK (just don't mark any words with this feature).

form.codeInfo: Show appropriate instruction, depending on how they answered
form.instruction: Key the feature Deg modifies_Adv on this type of degree word in the lexicon.
Key the features Deg modifies_Adv-reason on this type of degree word in the lexicon

In the lexicon, key the features:
Deg modifies_temporal for temporal modifiers,
Deg modifies_locative for locative modifiers,
Deg modifies_manner for manner modifiers, and
Deg modifies_reason for reason modifiers
